ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Song mix ?
ygData.msgSnippet: At 30, my songlist in dalnirs is: COB (I group with an enchanter) Largos Hymm Selos outside/Shaurys inside FCC Pixie Strike Charm Fear I am using a lamatation
ygData.messageBody:
At 30, my songlist in dalnirs is:

COB (I group with an enchanter)
Largos
Hymm
Selos outside/Shaurys inside
FCC
Pixie Strike
Charm
Fear

I am using a lamatation blade and silvery axe.
FCC has a better range than bellow and is great for
pulling altho I don't notice much damage even with
drum.

I like chains, but when you're hit my muliples, Largos
is nice to have. I also group with a druid so snaring
isn't an issue for me.


--- TommyC <ubersorcerer@...> wrote:
> As in the pat when I feel I've hit a brick wall I
> turn to this list to give me a boost. So here is my
> new qurey:
> I just made 30th level, Up to now I've been singing
> Anthem & Psalm of Warmth, with Pixie, Charm and
> Chains thrown in when needed. For down time I play(
> with lute) Hymn. I always keep Selos mem'd with
> Screech for a fast getaway. so there are my 8 song
> slots. I weild weapons most of the time Kirsh & Obs.
> Shard in off hand.
> Now I'm 30 I got my first Chant...but last nite I
> was at a loss as how to weave it into my mix, do I
> do all instruments? do i sing it as a 3rd or 4th
> song what song do I drop? Most of the time I fight
> in High Keep or Karnuk so AoE aggro is not a
> problem.
> Please help me :-)
>
> Pinen
> bard of the rathe 30 songs ( and took too long to
> get 'em)
> GM-Noble Warriors of Norrath
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been
> removed]
>
>
